name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior MLOps Engineer, I bring 8 years of experience in full-stack development with a strong focus on MLOps, CI/CD, and cloud services. My technical expertise encompasses **Python**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**. I have successfully designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate machine learning workflows, ensuring rapid deployment and continuous integration of models.
My background in machine learning includes hands-on experience with **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, enabling the creation and deployment of robust ML models in production environments. I am proficient in utilizing monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to ensure system performance and reliability.
Additionally, I possess strong problem-solving skills and effective communication abilities, which have empowered me to lead cross-functional teams in developing secure and compliant applications aligned with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have a proven track record in building high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance, leveraging modern architectures and fostering innovation through intelligent automation.
